duties_responsibilities.duty: Support a global team of GE Vernova Facilities Category Management professionals.
Establish and lead strategic commodity management activities in various categories.
Manage corporate sourcing process end-to-end, including strategy, performance monitoring, and supplier relationship management.
Develop best-in-class analytics related to the assigned category spend.
Lead organizational, process, and culture change within the assigned category spend group.
Coordinate with Business Unit Category Management teams to ensure cohesive global strategy and execution of initiatives.
Partner with GE functional stakeholders in Business and Segment Sourcing, Operations, and Supply Chain to drive total cost efficiency reductions.

Address the climate crisis by moving GE energy businesses—including Renewables, Power, Digital and Energy Financial Services—under one banner to deliver a united, focused, one-of-a-kind force: GE Vernova.
Chart the course to a cleaner, better future by acting swiftly and surely to help build a lower carbon energy era.
Retain the treasured birthright of quality and ingenuity through the enduring badge of
Build a better future by implementing change and delivering results.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college (or a high school diploma with relevant experience)
MBA or Bachelor’s degree in Sourcing or Supply Chain Management (desired)
